Linked Data Definitions

Source: R/definitions.R
uklr_def.Rd

These functions return the definitions for the linked data construction in a tibble.

uklr_def()

ukhp_def()

ukppd_def()

uktrans_def()

Value

Returns a tibble.

Examples


uklr_def()
#> # A tibble: 32 x 29
#>    uri   pref.label label comment domain domain...uri imports imports...uri
#>    <chr> <fct>      <fct> <fct>   <fct>  <fct>        <fct>   <fct>        
#>  1 http~ ""         Comm~ Common~ ""     ""           core    http://www.w~
#>  2 http~ ""         Addr~ Super ~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#>  3 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#>  4 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#>  5 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#>  6 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#>  7 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#>  8 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#>  9 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#> 10 http~ ""         BS76~ BS7666~ ""     ""           ""      ""           
#> # ... with 22 more rows, and 21 more variables: range <fct>, range...uri <fct>,
#> #   sub.class.of <fct>, sub.class.of...uri <fct>, sub.property.of <fct>,
#> #   sub.property.of...uri <fct>, top.concept...estate.type.notation <fct>,
#> #   top.concept...property.type.notation <fct>, top.concept...label <fct>,
#> #   top.concept...notation <fct>, top.concept...pref.label <fct>,
#> #   top.concept...skos_definition <fct>, top.concept...uri <fct>,
#> #   top.concept...type <lgl>, top.concept...type...uri <fct>,
#> #   top.concept...uri.1 <fct>, top.concept...top.concept.of <fct>,
#> #   top.concept...top.concept.of...uri <fct>, type <fct>, type...uri <fct>,
#> #   version.info <fct>

ukhp_def()
#> # A tibble: 155 x 20
#>    uri   label comment component_uri component_attri~ component_attri~
